üèÜ Most popular Disney animated films
üß≠ Animated films about adventures and travels
Moana is the daughter of the chief of a small tribe on the coast of the Pacific Ocean. Since childhood, she stood out among other children with her desire to travel, and over time nothing has changed dramatically. She was still an avid lover of sudden travels. But before, this was only the limit of her dreams. This time she finally decided to change her life and go on a long sea voyage with the former demigod: Maui, who has now lost his former strength, but was still ready to travel.
Before embarking on this journey, she already knew that many obstacles awaited her there, including various monsters who would want to destroy unwanted guests. But this fact did not scare her at all, because she really wanted to bring all her dreams to life, and now that she had started implementing this dream, it would not be easy to stop her.
